MemoryInfobox.description: 'A 'Courtesan|hetaera' entertained a client who promised her riches but delivered nothing. Her reputation at stake, the 'hetaera' plotted against him.'

General_Description: '''Broken Promises''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A ''[[Courtesan|hetaera]]'' sought the help of a [[mercenary]] to enact vengeance on a frugal client.
Section_Dialogue:
While Kassandra was travelling across [[Greece]], a ''hetaera'' caught her attention and motioned her aside.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Anything a ''misthios'' can help you with, stranger?''
*'''Woman:''' ''One of my clients gives me nothing but excuses. I cannot live on such wretched offerings. The other ''hetaerae'' all receive beautiful gifts.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It sounds like he's trying to cheat you.''
*'''Woman:''' ''I won't stand for that. Here I am, without so much as a necklace or new robe—not even a coin for all his promises. The other girls have started mocking me.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You need me to deal with him.''
*'''Woman:''' ''You understand quickly.''
(Accept – "I'm going to help you.")
[[File:ACOD-BrokenPromises-04.jpg|thumb|250px|Kassandra aiming her bow at the ''hetaera''{{'}}s client.]]
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm in.''
*'''Woman:''' ''I'm in your debt.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You can leave everything to me.''
Kassandra tracked down the client, who was in deep conversation with another man near the market, and killed him.
*'''Kasssandra:''' ''Time to collect.''
Kassandra returned to the hetaera.
*'''Woman:''' ''Has he been... dealt with, ''misthios''?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''He won't be bothering anyone anymore.''
*'''Woman:''' ''You've set great things in motion. Take this as thanks.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That'll do.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and assassinated the ''hetaera''{{'}}s miserly client.
Section_Trivia: *The location and character models for both the quest giver and the client are randomized.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
